author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-A.G.Barr Expects ‍Total Revenue For 52 Weeks Ended Jan 27 To Be About 277 Mln Pounds
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - A.G.Barr Plc:
* ‍TOTAL REVENUE FOR 52 WEEKS ENDED 27 JANUARY 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE C.£277M, UP C.7.5%​
* ‍2018 WILL BE ANOTHER CHALLENGING YEAR FOR UK BUSINESSES AGAINST BACKDROP OF CONTINUED UNCERTAIN ECONOMIC CONDITIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
